turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm wanting to order a Starbucks coffee and have it picked up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking that I want an iced Starbucks blonde chestnut praline latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking I just want a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I would love to have coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want an iced grande blonde chestnut praline latte with coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your drink, iced grande blonde chestnut praline latte with coconut milk with extra whipped cream, will be read at starbucks on california street soon.

items.name: iced Starbucks blonde chestnut praline latte.
iced grande blonde chestnut praline latte
